headline: Mastercard's Michelle Meyer: Consumers 'Ready to Shop'
summary: Michelle Meyer, Chief Economist at Mastercard Economic Institute, says consumers remain engaged and ready to shop this holiday season. She tells Katie Greifeld and Romaine Bostick on "The Close" that while spending can be volatile, she expects consumers to stay active in the economic cycle.

headline: Open Lending Appoints Abhijit Chaudhary to Board of Directors
summary: Seasoned Fintech Leader Joins Board, Bringing Over Two Decades of Expertise Driving Product Innovation and Growth Across Consumer FinanceAUSTIN, Texas, Nov. 25, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Open Lending Corporation (NASDAQ: LPRO) (the “Company” or “Open Lending”), a leading provider of lending enablement and risk analytics solutions for financial institutions, today announced the appointment of Abhijit “Abhi” Chaudhary to its Board of Directors as a Class I director, effective November 21, 2025. headline: T-Mobile Unwraps the Ultimate Apple Bundle — All on Us for Black Friday
summary: BELLEVUE, Wash., November 25, 2025--T-Mobile (NASDAQ: TMUS) is taking Black Friday to the next level, offering nearly $2000 in savings with an Apple Bundle and even more ways to save this season. Starting tomorrow, Nov. 26, new and existing customers, including businesses, can score the brand-new iPhone 17 Pro, iPad (A16) and Apple Watch SE 3, all on Us. headline: Kraken launches Mastercard for UK, European users as neobank race heats up
summary: The Mastercard debit card offers 1% cashback in fiat or Bitcoin. Kraken’s launch is the latest battlefront among emerging neobanks. The exchange’s Krak app unveiled new Vaults that yield up to 10%.
